@@ -98,0 +98,8 @@ + *

+ * If n denotes the returned number of inflated bytes then {@code buf[off]} + * trough {@code buf[off+}n{@code -1]} will contain the uncompressed data. The + * elements {@code buf[off+}n{@code ]} through {@code buf[off+}len{@code -1]} + * are undefined and an implementation is free to change them during the inflate + * operation. If the return value is -1 or an exception is thrown the whole + * content of {@code buf} is undefined. + *
